exportedScanResultImageContainerSaved.title: ExportedScanResultImageContainerSaved
exportedScanResultImageContainerSaved.description: Sets the storage as container of exported images.

path.description: Sets the path the images are saved into.

exportedScanResultImageContainerEncoded.title: ExportedScanResultImageContainerEncoded
exportedScanResultImageContainerEncoded.description: Sets the json as container of exported images.

exportedScanResultImageContainer.title: ExportedScanResultImageContainer
exportedScanResultImageContainer.description: Sets the container of exported images.

exportedScanResultImageParameters.title: Exported ScanResult Image Parameters
exportedScanResultImageParameters.description: Configuration for Exported ScanResult Image Parameters

quality.title: ExportedScanResultImageQuality
quality.description: Sets the quality value between 1 and 100 of exported images.

format.title: ExportedScanResultImageFormat
format.description: Sets the format of exported images.

image.description: The source of full frame image as specified in the container.

cutoutImage.description: The source of cutout image as specified in the container.

faceImage.description: The source of face image as specified in the container.
